name: Heritage Game Jam 2020 - Singaporean Life
description:
[DOWNLOAD THE .EXE FOR THE FULL EXPERIENCE as WebGL version may be cropped or laggy! Additionally, activate Full-Screen to avoid these issues!]

Is money the be all, end all? Or is there more to life in Singapore than that?

Singaporean Life is an arcade platformer where the player takes on the character of a Singaporean and navigates their way through life. The decisions they make affect their opportunities, choices and even changes the way the path is set for them. Once they have completed a playthrough, they may replay again to try out a different possible route to earn as much achievements as possible. Whether their goal is to earn the most amount of money as possible, or just enjoy the journey and not be distracted by money, it's all up to the player to decide what means most to them.

Singapore Life was developed using Unity for the Singapore Heritage Game Jam 2020.

(Disclaimer: Singapore Life contains stereotypes and perceptions that may reflect real world views. We bring it up in our game to challenge the state of our current reality, but also provide options that allow the player to defy the odds.)
